00037 //! The call type as dictated by the translation file.
00038 enum ADT_CALL_TYPE_ENUM {
00039   ADT_CALL_TYPE_NULL,
00040   ADT_CALL_TYPE_MARKER,
00041   ADT_CALL_TYPE_HAPLOTYPE_GROUP,
00042   ADT_CALL_TYPE_COPY_NUMBER,
00043 };
